Mobility Boots
Edit
Stats
+115 movement speed
Passive
Reduces movement speed by 90 for 5 seconds while you are in in-combat. This duration can refresh while staying in-combat.

 +  700

Mobility Boots was a boots item in League of Legends.

Recipe

Mobility Boots
1000 ( 700)
Boots
300

Cost Analysis

Gold efficiency
  • Mobility Boots' base stats were <span class="basic-tooltip" style="border-bottom:1px dotted gray;cursor:help;" title="Expression error: Unexpected < operator.">Expression error: Missing operand for /.% gold efficient.
  • Mobility Boots are 30% gold efficient while its passive is active.

Other media[edit source]

Notes

  • When being invulnerable, basic attacks and non-crowd control abilities received will not put you in-combat.
  • Healing and buffing allies does not count as in-combat.
  • Damage over time abilities reset the timer with each tick of damage.
  • Attacking wards does not count as in-combat.

Similar items

Berserker's Greaves
Boots of Swiftness
Ionian Boots of Lucidity
Mercury's Treads
Plated Steelcaps
Sorcerer's Shoes

Strategy

  • Mobility Boots is especially useful if you don't have Teleport to switch lanes.
  • Mobility Boots is good in particular early-mid game on roaming champions such as junglers or mid laners, that want to quickly gank different lanes. They lose most value when team fights start to happen. It also allows for chasing and escaping.
  • Mobility Boots is very cheap, making it effective on any champion that is constantly returning to base early game and wants a quick and cheap way to return to lane without Teleport.
  • Being in-combat means engaging in combat with enemies. Affecting allies does not cause you to lose Mobility Boots' bonus.

Trivia

Patch History

V14.10 - Removed
  • Removed from the game.
  • Replaced by Symbiotic Soles.
V10.23 - Added
  • Replaces Boots of Mobility.
  • Recipe: Boots + 700 = 1000.
  • Stats: 25 movement speed.
  • Passive: When out-of-combat for at least 5 seconds, increase this item's effect to 115 movement speed.
  • Limited to 1 Boots item.
